import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Vichingo } from '../cummon/vichingo'; import { DatiServizioService } from '../cummon/dati-servizio.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-visualizza-vichinghi', templateUrl: './visualizza-vichinghi.component.html', styleUrls: ['./visualizza-vichinghi.component.css'] }) export class VisualizzaVichinghiComponent { listaVichinghi!: Vichingo[]; vett:any; constructor(public dati:DatiServizioService){ } ngOnInit(){ this.dati.getDatiV().subscribe(dati=>{ this.listaVichinghi = dati; }) } Dati(){ return console.log(this.dati.getDati()); } }
